name: Scary Bertram
description:
Scary Bertram

Wander through the school grounds as a kid in desperate need for his phone. In the school lurks the sinister and ominous janitor Scary Bertram. To survive you must navigate through the school without being caught, and use conveniently placed items to your bidding.

Scary Bertram brings you back in school. The game features a soundtrack by none other but Mitchell. Use the keys [W] [A] [S] [D] to move your character.
